<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3103</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reading Cards -No 3:Experiments</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesekarten - Kein 3:Experiments</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cartes de Lecture - Aucun 3:Experiments</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cartões Da Leitura - Nenhum 3:Experiments</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schedi Della Lettura - Nessun 3:Experiments</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάρτες ανάγνωσης - κανένα 3:Experiments</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tarjetas De la Lectura - Ningún 3:Experiments</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is an assgnment where the student is required to read descriptions of Six science experiments and decide which scientific principle explains the experiment’s results</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading skills</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">science</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">experiments</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">scientific principles</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein assgnment, in dem der 
Kursteilnehmer benoetigt wird, Beschreibungen von sechs Wissenschaft 
Experimenten zu lesen und zu entscheiden, welche wissenschaftliche 
Grundregel die experiment?s Resultate erklärt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un assgnment où l'étudiant est requis de 
lire des descriptions de six expériences de la science et de décider
quel principe scientifique explique les résultats d'experiment?s</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um assgnment onde o estudante seja 
requerido ler descrições de seis experiências da ciência e se 
decidir que princípio científico explica os resultados dos 
experiment?s</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un assgnment dove l'allievo è tenuto a 
leggere lle descrizioni di sei esperimenti di scienza ed a decidere 
quale principio scientifico spiega i risultati dei experiment?s</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα assgnment όπου ο σπουδαστής πρέπει
για να διαβάσει τις περιγραφές έξι πειραμάτων επιστήμης και να 
αποφασίσει ποια επιστημονική αρχή εξηγεί τα αποτελέσματα 
experiment?s</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es un assgnment donde requieren al estudiante
leer descripciones de seis experimentos de la ciencia y decidir qué 
principio científico explica los resultados de los experiment?s</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesefähigkeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Experimente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">wissenschaftliche Grundregeln</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
